content: what is  RC book outline (others on Kindle?)?

An RC book outline, also known as an "Others on Kindle" outline, is a format followed by publishers and authors when formatting and organizing the contents of a book intended for publication on Amazon's Kindle e-reader platform. The outline typically includes chapters, sections, and subsections, and serves as a guiding structure for organizing the content of the book. This outline format ensures clarity, flow, and ease of navigation for readers on Kindle devices.
